job_description.about_role: We are seeking a passionate and experienced AI Engineer to join our team in designing, building, and deploying AI-powered solutions that solve real-world problems. You will collaborate closely with data scientists, product managers, and software engineers to bring state-of-the-art machine learning models into production.
responsibilities: Design and implement machine learning and deep learning models for NLP, computer vision, and recommendation systems.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into scalable products.
Develop data pipelines and model serving infrastructure using cloud services (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure).
Optimize and fine-tune models for performance, latency, and accuracy in production environments.
Stay current with research in artificial intelligence and machine learning; contribute to internal knowledge sharing.
requirements: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, AI, Machine Learning, or a related field.
2+ years of experience developing and deploying ML/AI models in production.
Proficient in Python and ML libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn).
Experience with cloud platforms and containerization tools (Docker, Kubernetes).
Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software engineering principles.
preferred_qualifications: Experience with LLMs, generative AI, or reinforcement learning.
Familiarity with MLOps tools (e.g., MLflow, SageMaker, Vertex AI).
Contributions to open-source AI projects or published research.
